ownerAddress.description: Token holder address (optional; defaults to request walletAddress unless sponsored mode delegates)

minBalance.description: Minimum token balance required (human-readable units, e.g., "10.5")

chainId.description: Chain ID where the token contract is deployed (testnet or mainnet). The backend reads from this chain using server-side RPC configuration.

blockNumber.description: Optional block number for a point-in-time balance check
